posts.post_content:

Thank you for all the emails and PM's.  I'm on the east coast and the snow storm knocked out our internet until now.  I will be sending scans to each person in the next few minutes.  Thank you!
Just letting everyone know the prices on every card have been reduced.  Thanks!
